funding-group.funding-statement: EAM was supported by the National Science Foundation ( nsf.gov; DEB-1518681 and DEB-1640780), the Stanford Center for Innovation in Global Health ( http://globalhealth.stanford.edu/), and the Stanford Woods Institute for the Environment ( https://woods.stanford.edu/). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
